KnowledgeBase.Title: Example String isType 002
KnowledgeBase.TypeKeywords:
Character String Symbol Vector BitVector ByteVector IntVector
FltVector ObjVector Structure Dictionary Directory
Matrix NumMatrix Integer Float Number Complex

Example.Description: This example checks if the defined vector object is of the same type as the user specified type in the isType function. If it is, the function returns true, otherwise, it returns false.

Syntax.Note: Sets tempVector1 as a vector with the values "Hello" and "World".
Syntax.Hints:
The syntax: (isType String: obj)
is also equivalent to: (isString obj)
